title: APPLE ipad Mini (2019) 64 GB ROM 7.9 inch with Wi-Fi Only (Space Grey)

product_specification.Processor Type: A12 Bionic Chip, 64-bit Architecture with Neural Engine and Embedded M12 Co-processor
product_specification.Sales Package: iPad Mini, Lightning to USB Cable, USB Power Adapter, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sensors: Touch ID, 3-axis Gyro, Accelerometer, Barometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Multi Touch Display, Wide Color Display (P3), Fingerprint Resistant Oleophobic Coating True Tone Fully Laminated Display, Anti-reflective Coating, 500 nits Brightness, Supports Apple Pencil
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: AAC (8 to 320 Kbps), Protected AAC (from iTunes Store), HE-AAC, MP3 (8 to 320 Kbps), MP3 VBR, Dolby Digital (AC-3), Dolby Digital Plus (E-AC-3), Audible (Formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX, and AAX+), Apple Lossless, AIFF, and WAV
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: H.264, MPEG-4, M4V, MP4, MOV, M-JPEG, AVI
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and In-box Accessories Including Battery from the Date of Purchase

product_description.Portable Design: The iPad Mini can be carried along anywhere, thanks to its thin and light design. With a battery life of up to 10 hours, you can pursue your creative tasks even while you are on-the-go.
product_description.A12 Bionic Chip: This iPad is powered by the A12 Bionic Chip which paves the way for fast performance. What’s more? It can also run the most powerful applications seamlessly.
product_description.Retina Display: Get set to see your favourite visuals in all their glory on this iPad Mini’s 20.0 cm (7.9) display. Oh, and no matter what lighting you are seated under, you can read everything on your iPad clearly.
product_description.Camera: With the presence of an 8 MP rear camera and a 7 MP FaceTime HD camera, this tablet lets you click stunning pictures, videos, and even make great clarity video calls. You can also use augmented reality to make your designs come to life.
product_description.Supports Apple Pencil: This version of your favourite iPad Mini series supports the Apple Pencil, thereby letting you be more creative and free.
product_description.Other Features: This iPad comes with 64 GB of ROM, thereby leaving you with enough space to store all your games, music, documents, and other files. It supports Wi-Fi connectivity.

It’s handy and extremely powerful. I am writing this review from the device and it feels pleasure. Totally worth it and I had been waiting for this product to be in stock for a very long period of time. A12 Bionic chip and 3 GB RAM are extremely helpful for me to run heavy applications. On the other hand, the relatively smaller size makes it comfortable to carry and work anywhere and anytime. If you are a traveller, this device will never disappoint you. Go for it 👍🏽

Great performance and display but with a mediocre camera and okayish battery life. Sound via speaker is also fine. Great secondary device and best for gaming and entertainment. Apple arcade is also great with good games and an honest price. For a first time ios user it's a little confusing at start as there are a lot of restrictions. Played both PUBG and COD and both ran without even breakung any sweat on highest graphics quality. Takes around 3 hrs to fully charge and lasts about half a day on heavy usage which consists of heavy gaming and browsing on chrome and YouTube playback. A good family device and a good e book reader. Overall a genuine value for money product from Apple.

At first I was unable to decide among ipad 7th gen, mini 5 and air 3. After doing some research, I finally thought to go for this one as this one is having a12 chipset (7th generation iPad has a10, other reasons to avoid 7th gen model is the non-laminated display, 1st gen touch id etc.) & I can manage with 7.9 inch screen size (and also pocket friendly so I didn't choose air3). Moreover, mini 5 is having the highest PPI so the display is sharp and crisp.
If you are buying it for the purpose of reading, gaming, browsing internet, streaming and watching media contents, then you can surely go for it without any hesitation.
There're many aspects of small screen size. Advantage for some and disadvantage for some. To talk about disadvantages, while using apple pencil(while note taking), you may face little bit difficulty as your palm will rest to the edges because of small screen size. [***It supports 1st generation Apple Pencil only***] While watching movies, you may not get that feel which you'll get watching in large screen size. Again, the portability is greatly increased as mini 5 is compact in size.
I expected they'll provide 12 watt charger atleast with this but what they provided is 10 watt. Be it 10 watt or 12 watt, it will take around 4 hours to charge the battery fully.
I will suggest you guys to go for it if you can manage with 7.9 inch screen size. If you need bigger size with a12 chipset, go with air 3, the daddy version of it & if you can manage with a slower processor a10 and bigger screen size, go for 7th generation model. Good luck. 😊

Some may say its expensive, but dont forget that you are getting the fastest SoC at this price. The 2018 A12 Bionic chip STILL outperforms some of the 2019 Snapdragon 855 smartphones in certain tests. But remember the optimization of iOS which helps it perform better in real life usage.

PROS:
1) Perfect size and Weight- Helps in hour long reading, surfing and specially playing games. Try playing PUBG on an iPAD Pro for more than 1 hour, i bet your arms will start giving away,
2) A12 Bionic Chip is super efficient and powerful, will make your device remain relevant for another 3-5 years, considering its a 7nm SoC and its really difficult to manufacture something smaller than this. 4nm SoC are around 4-5 years away.
3) Awesome True Tone display! Really helpful at night.
4) Great graphical performance without heating issue. Can play 60fps PUBG for hours without frame drop. (Samsung Galaxy S10 with its SD 855 over heats within 30mins, thus making its 'powerful' SoC useless )

CONS:
1) Camera is pretty bad. But then this is a tablet.
2) There is no 128GB model. 64GB is too less and 256GB model is too expensive.
3) No Jailbreak for iOS 12.2 (yet)

The general tablet ecosystem is pretty rubbish, and I've been looking for a tablet for my kids and for home use in general. Looked at a few Android tablets and they all seemed subpar. Not to mention the fact that the only Android tablets worth buying are in the price range of an iPad.

I picked the iPad mini over the 2019 iPad Beecher l mostly because of the A12 bionic chip in the mini. from an overall performance point of view, I didn't want to compromise.

To be fair, I may have enjoyed media more on a bigger tablet screen, but for the most part this is reasonably big enough. Especially since the screen itself is very high quality.

The battery life hasn't been typical Apple standard, but that may be because my kids watch a lot of media on it, in full brightness and full volume.

The only thing I felt was not as I had expected was the sound output. Overall quality seems okay, but unless I'm watching on full volume, the speakers don't carry as much power.

All in all a great buy. Happy so far

I have already a 6th gen 9.7 inch. I was looking for a Pro or Air for music production. But they comes with new C type connector. Earlier I bought a lighting to usb 3 camera connection kit. That kit works with mini 5. And this model supports my apple pencil 1. So I picked mini 5. Before I got the tab I did not like the size. But after using it for 4-5 days I understand that I was wrong. The display is too good, far better than the 9.7 6th gen. Moreover, I can hold it with one hand. This is really handy, but powerful enough. Far more powerful than the A10 processor (6th or 7th gen). A12 Bionic processor, GPU & 3GB ram is enough to run Sampletank pro + Miraslov 1 & 2 (7.5 GB app size) without any issue. Plus point: it has also a headphone jack which is not present in pro or air. To me there is no better option than this. The pro is more powerful but very costly too. After 2 or 3 years configuration will be upgraded with newer models. It is not easy to buy a 100k tab every 2 years. But a budget like mini may be considered.
Flipkart delivered me before time. The parcel was also very nicely packed (1st: outer plastic bag to protect from water, 2nd: hard cardboard box to protect the product box, 3rd: seal packed original product box). The product is genuine, new, recently imported and about 1K less than the Apple store. Yes I recommend others to buy it from Flipkart.
